articles.title: Hamas accepts Trump’s plan to end the war in Gaza, but with conditions - The Washington Post
articles.description: The plan aims to secure the release of Israeli hostages held in the Gaza Strip and end a two-year conflict that has reduced much of the enclave to rubble.
articles.content: JERUSALEM Hamas said Friday it would conditionally accept a White House ceasefire proposal, issuing a statement that President Donald Trump said led him to believe they are ready for a lasting peace.
